coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [Vibration] Count on self, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

levelList.name: Can't Use That Weapon Now

[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count
[WhenUse] At 5+ [Vibration] Count, Clash Power +1

levelList.name: Ready For A Beating?
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with [VibrationCollapse]
[WhenUse] Apply [Vibration] Count equal to [Vibration] Count on self to all other allies
[WhenUse] Trigger [Switch_Vibration] on all allies(including this unit) to convert their [Vibration] to [VibrationDistribution]
[DefeatDuel] Deal -80% damage and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target

levelList.name: Guard
levelList.desc: [StartBattle] Gain 5 x ([Vibration] Count on self) Shield HP (max 60)

levelList.name: For the Greater Good
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
[StartBattle] Draw all other allies' [Vibration] Count to self; [Vibration] on all allies expire
[StartBattle] Gain 1 [AttackUp] for every 3 [Vibration] Count on self
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Vibration] Count

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal 20% bonus Sloth damage for every [Vibration] Count on self
